name: Balloon Shoot
description:
Shoot the arrow and pop the balloon. Play in your favorite shooting game settings. This is an incredibly addictive archery game. Enjoy the best archery game in store now!
Features:
- Realistic physics simulation and sound effects
- Easy and user friendly controls
- Shape graphics and beautiful theme
- lovely animations
- Challenging and exciting
- Get free coins and get free new items
- Unlock various achievements after completing the missions
- Reach the TOP of Leaderboard to compete with friends
Game play:
- There are 3 game settings which are arcade, timed and classic
- Touch the left of the bow to launch the arrow
- There are various balloon figures. You can buy new ones after you pass each level
- Each figure has 4 sizes. From the smallest to the biggest, they correspond to points 100, 60, 30,10
- You will get 150 points when you kill the bird when it shows up
- The more level you passed, the more powerful and faster is your arrow
